001package edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.adapter;
002
003import android.os.Bundle;
004import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
005import androidx.fragment.app.Fragment;
006import androidx.viewpager2.adapter.FragmentStateAdapter;
007import edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.controller.BoardFragment;
008import edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.model.Game;
009
010/**
011 * This adapter class is used to create new board fragments for each user in each game.
012 */
013public class BoardsAdapter extends FragmentStateAdapter {
014
015  private final int size;
016
017  public BoardsAdapter(@NonNull Fragment fragment, Game game) {
018    super(fragment);
019    size = game.getBoards().size();
020  }
021
022  @NonNull
023  @Override
024  public Fragment createFragment(int position) {
025    Fragment fragment = new BoardFragment();
026    Bundle bundle = new Bundle();
027    bundle.putInt(BoardFragment.BOARD_INDEX_KEY, position);
028    fragment.setArguments(bundle);
029    return fragment;
030  }
031
032  @Override
033  public int getItemCount() {
034    return size;
035  }
036}
